company_info.section_description: Information about your company that will be displayed on invoices, quotations and other documents created by Qbh-ebill.
company_info.delete_company_description: Once you delete your company, you will lose all the data and files associated with it permanently.
company_info.delete_company_modal_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete {company} and all of its associated data.

custom_fields.title: Custom Fields
custom_fields.section_description: Customize your Invoices, Quotations & Payment Receipts with your own fields. Make sure to use the below added fields on the address formats on Customization settings page.
custom_fields.label: Label
custom_fields.name: Name
custom_fields.help_text_description: Enter some text to help users understand the purpose of this custom field.
custom_fields.custom_field_confirm_delete: You will not be able to recover this Custom Field
custom_fields.already_in_use: Custom Field is already in use
custom_fields.press_enter_to_add: Press enter to add new option
custom_fields.model_in_use: Cannot update model for fields which are already in use.
custom_fields.type_in_use: Cannot update type for fields which are already in use.

customization.learn_custom_format: Learn how to use custom format
customization.series_description: To set a static prefix/postfix like 'INV' across your company. It supports character length of up to 8 chars.
customization.delimiter_description: Single character for specifying the boundary between 2 separate components. By default its set to -
customization.date_format_description: A local date and time field which accepts a format parameter. The default format: 'Y' renders the current year.
customization.sequence_description: Consecutive sequence of numbers across your company. You can specify the length on the given paramter.
customization.customer_series_description: To set a different prefix/postfix for each client.
customization.customer_sequence_description: Consecutive sequence of numbers for each of your client.
customization.random_sequence_description: Random alphanumeric string. You can specify the length on the given paramter.

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.invoice_number_format_description: Customize how your invoice number gets generated automatically when you create a new invoice.
invoices.due_date_description: Specify how due date is automatically set when you create an invoice.
invoices.set_due_date_automatically_description: Enable this if you wish to set due date automatically when you create a new invoice.
invoices.default_formats_description: Below given formats are used to fill up the fields automatically on invoice creation.
invoices.invoice_email_attachment_setting_descrip: Enable this if you want to send invoices as email attachment. Please note that 'View Invoice' button in emails will not be displayed anymore when enabled.
invoices.disable_on_invoice_partial_paid: Disable after partial payment is recorded
invoices.disable_on_invoice_paid: Disable after full payment is recorded
invoices.retrospective_edits_description: Based on your country's laws or your preference, you can restrict users from editing finalised invoices.

purchases.title: Vat Purchase Register
purchases.purchase_number_format_description: Customize how your vat purchase number gets generated automatically when you create a new vat purchase register.
purchases.due_date_description: Specify how due date is automatically set when you create an vat purchase register.
purchases.purchase_settings_updated: Vat Purchase Register Settings updated successfully
purchases.retrospective_edits_description: Based on your country's laws or your preference, you can restrict users from editing finalised invoices.

proformas.title: Proforma Invoices
proformas.proforma_number_format_description: Customize how your proforma number gets generated automatically when you create a new proforma.
proformas.due_date_description: Specify how due date is automatically set when you create an proforma.
proformas.set_due_date_automatically_description: Enable this if you wish to set due date automatically when you create a new proforma.
proformas.default_formats_description: Below given formats are used to fill up the fields automatically on proforma creation.
proformas.proforma_email_attachment_setting_descri: Enable this if you want to send proformas as email attachment. Please note that 'View Proforma Invoice' button in emails will not be displayed anymore when enabled.
proformas.disable_on_proforma_partial_paid: Disable after partial payment is recorded
proformas.disable_on_proforma_paid: Disable after full payment is recorded
proformas.retrospective_edits_description: Based on your country's laws or your preference, you can restrict users from editing finalised invoices.

credits.title: Credit Notes
credits.credit_number_format_description: Customize how your credit note number gets generated automatically when you create a new credit note.
credits.due_date_description: Specify how due date is automatically set when you create an credit note.
credits.set_due_date_automatically_description: Enable this if you wish to set due date automatically when you create a new credit note.
credits.default_formats_description: Below given formats are used to fill up the fields automatically on credit note creation.
credits.credit_email_attachment_setting_descript: Enable this if you want to send credit note as email attachment. Please note that 'View Credit Note' button in emails will not be displayed anymore when enabled.
credits.disable_on_credit_partial_paid: Disable after partial payment is recorded
credits.disable_on_credit_paid: Disable after full payment is recorded
credits.retrospective_edits_description: Based on your country's laws or your preference, you can restrict users from editing finalised credit notes.

debits.title: Debit Notes
debits.debit_number_format_description: Customize how your debit note number gets generated automatically when you create a new debit note.
debits.due_date_description: Specify how due date is automatically set when you create an debit note.
debits.set_due_date_automatically_description: Enable this if you wish to set due date automatically when you create a new debit note.
debits.default_formats_description: Below given formats are used to fill up the fields automatically on debit note creation.
debits.debit_email_attachment_setting_descripti: Enable this if you want to send debit note as email attachment. Please note that 'View debit Note' button in emails will not be displayed anymore when enabled.
debits.disable_on_debit_partial_paid: Disable after partial payment is recorded
debits.disable_on_debit_paid: Disable after full payment is recorded
debits.retrospective_edits_description: Based on your country's laws or your preference, you can restrict users from editing finalised debit notes.

estimates.title: Quotations
estimates.estimate_number_format_description: Customize how your quotation number gets generated automatically when you create a new quotation.
estimates.expiry_date_description: Specify how expiry date is automatically set when you create an quotation.
estimates.set_expiry_date_automatically_descriptio: Enable this if you wish to set expiry date automatically when you create a new quotation.
estimates.default_formats_description: Below given formats are used to fill up the fields automatically on quotation creation.
estimates.estimate_email_attachment_setting_descri: Enable this if you want to send the quotations as an email attachment. Please note that 'View Quotation' button in emails will not be displayed anymore when enabled.
estimates.convert_estimate_description: Specify what happens to the quotation after it gets converted to an invoice.

payments.title: Payments

payments.payment_email_attachment_setting_descrip: Enable this if you want to send the payment receipts as an email attachment. Please note that 'View Payment' button in emails will not be displayed anymore when enabled.

tax_types.title: Tax Types
tax_types.description: You can Add or Remove Taxes as you please. Qbh-ebill supports Taxes on Individual Items as well as on the invoice.
tax_types.tax_setting_description: Enable this if you want to add taxes to individual invoice items. By default, taxes are added directly to the invoice.

preferences.discount_setting_description: Enable this if you want to add Discount to individual invoice items. By default, Discount is added directly to the invoice.
preferences.deduction_setting_description: Enable this if you want to add Deduction to individual invoice items.

update_app.title: Update App
update_app.description: You can easily update Qbh-ebill by checking for a new update by clicking the button below
update_app.progress_text: It will just take a few minutes. Please do not refresh the screen or close the window before the update finishes
update_app.update_success: App has been updated! Please wait while your browser window gets reloaded automatically.
update_app.latest_message: No update available! You are on the latest version.
update_app.update_failed_text: Sorry! Your update failed on : {step} step
update_app.update_warning: All of the application files and default template files will be overwritten when you update the application using this utility. Please take a backup of your templates & database before updating.

backup.title: Backup | Backups
backup.description: The backup is a zipfile that contains all files in the directories you specify along with a dump of your database
backup.backup_confirm_delete: You will not be able to recover this Backup

disk.title: File Disk | File Disks
disk.description: By default, Qbh-ebill will use your local disk for saving backups, avatar and other image files. You can configure more than one disk drivers like DigitalOcean, S3 and Dropbox according to your preference.
disk.name: Name
disk.set_default_disk_confirm: This disk will be set as default and all the new PDFs will be saved on this disk
disk.disk_setting_description: Enable this, if you wish to save a copy of each Invoice, Quotation & Payment Receipt PDF on your default disk automatically. Turning this option will decrease the load-time when viewing the PDFs.
disk.confirm_delete: Your existing files & folders in the specified disk will not be affected but your disk configuration will be deleted from Qbh-ebill
